description: Optimizes the response for brevity and directness, eliminating unnecessary details and verbose language. This decorator is ideal for obtaining quick answers, executive summaries, or essential information when time or space is limited.

parameters.name: maxWords
parameters.description: Maximum word count for the entire response

parameters.name: bulletPoints
parameters.description: Whether to use bullet points for maximum brevity

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The degree of conciseness to apply

examples.description: Basic concise explanation of a complex topic
examples.result: Provides a brief, to-the-point explanation of blockchain technology focusing only on essential concepts

examples.description: Extremely concise bulleted answer with word limit
examples.usage:
+++Concise(maxWords=50, bulletPoints=true, level=extreme)
What are the key factors in successful project management?
examples.result: Delivers a set of extremely concise bullet points covering only the most critical project management factors, totaling under 50 words
